version_description:
* Buy Tickets links
* Ins and Outs: reasons and new players
* News article sharing
* Infinite scrolling on News
* Match Centre improvements
* Bug fixes

- Splash Screen update
- AFL Spinner update
- Bug fixes

- Off-season updates
- Username and password reminder
- Non-match live audio 
- Bug fixes
-iOS 8 bug fix

Match Centre 'Coach' section, including:

- Pre-match head-to-head Power Ratings
- Boost your team's Power Rating by selecting your best 22 and match-ups
- Quarter-by-quarter Club and Player Heat Maps for every live match
- Live Tracker with scoring analysis, live interchange bench rotations and strategic stats including time in possession

Live Odds in pre-game Match Centre

Personalised AFL Login and My Account details

Bug fixes

PLEASE NOTE: An issue on version 3.1.8 is impacting live streaming on iPad. We recommend AFL Live Pass subscribers do not update to this version until further notice.

The AFL Live Official App now offers Apple Watch support to give fans quick access to match details, live scores and stats, and ladder updates.

- Upcoming match details and head-to-head form
- Live scores, stats and leading goal kickers for every match
- Ladder updates
- Notifications - Alerts for match starts, team announcements and news
- Glance with live score snapshot

Also included in this release:

-        Location based offers

-        Extended live match video preview

-        Bug fixes
- Fix for iPad video streaming issue

- Update to support Xcode 7
- Melbourne logo update
- Bug fixes

-NAB Challenge updates
-NAB Challenge match centre
-News filters - articles, videos, social
-News article swiping
-Player profile updates
- video bug fix

- New ‘1 on 1’ comparison tool for Players and Teams
- New Team Stats pages
- New Player and Team stats
- Player Profile updates including videos and articles
- Match Centre refresh with additional stats and match highlights
- Video section filters
- Coach section refresh with exclusive new stats and player Heat Maps
-bug fixes
- Video section continuous scroll

The new AFL Live Official App has been rebuilt from the ground up for the 2017 season with an improved fan experience featuring:

- Dynamic homepage updates with features based on time of week and match days
- Tab navigation with all the important content just a click away
- Matches section to view fixtures, live scores, results and filter by round, team and venue
- 2017 JLT Series match centre
- Pop out  and in situ video views 
- Personalise the app with your favourite team
- AFLW section and content
- Bug fixes
- bug fixes
- bug fix

-2017 Premiership season match centre
-Live match video screen for iPad including premium stats
-Live media overlay in match centre for access to all live video and audio
-Premium live match stats including team and player heat maps, live bench and scoring analysis 
-Live match player stats available via player profiles
-Premium match preview stats including power ratings and full squad status
-Team Announcements section with links to player match-ups
-Match Ups section for team and player comparisons by match, season and career
-Bug fixes

NEW StatsPro - Watch video highlights of EVERY possession, of EVERY player from EVERY game. Now you can watch every involvement that your favourite player had from any game. Head to the Stats section of the app to find out more.

The AFL Live Official app is back for season 2019. While all the best features are still available, we've introduced some updates and new features to get you closer to the action than ever before. 

- An updated home screen now gives you access to all the latest exclusive and breaking news and video, as well as the ladder, live ladder and ladder predictor. 

- The new match centre includes a live interchange bench, an all new match timeline complete with a full commentary feed and the new fully customisable player stats section.

New Home Page with quick access to the ladder and all the latest news and video
New Match Centre with full match timeline including in depth commentary insights

NEW Team Announcements in Augmented Reality:
- Now you can view every team lineup in AR. Pinch and Zoom, turn the field 360 degrees, and tap on any player to bring up their season stats. 

NEW Video Search:
- Use the new search bar on the Video page to easily find your favourite video content.

-NEW Countdown clock: We have introduced the ability to select the type of match clock shown for all live matches. You can now choose either the NEW countdown clock or keep the count up clock.

AFL Fantasy players, check out these new advanced player stats in the Match Centre by selecting customise stats or by tapping on a player :

- Centre Bounce Attendances
- Ruck Contests
- Kick Ins
- Kick-In Play On
This release includes seasonal updates, updated sponsor branding,  and performance improvements.
